entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ucluelet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:22 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tofino Airport 01:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 3.2°C
Wind: NNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 early this evening then northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 in the morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Wet flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. Wet flurries beginning in the evening and ending after midnight. Clearing overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
